title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 552.3 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 552.3 - Applicability

State Regulations
(a) This Part
applies to any provider of services which operates a program which provides
services to individuals with a diagnosis of mental illness and is licensed
pursuant to article 31 of the Mental Hygiene Law. Additional rules concerning
audits of private psychiatric hospitals and residential treatment facilities
for children and youth are found in section
577.6
and section
578.6
of this Title, respectively. (b) This Part applies
to a State operated program which provides services to individuals with a
diagnosis of mental illness. (c) This Part applies to any provider of services which has entered into contract
with or receives funding from the Office of Mental Health. (d) This Part does not apply to a provider of
inpatient services which is licensed pursuant to both article 28 of the Public

Health Law and article 31 of the Mental Hygiene Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 14
ยง
552.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
